title: Looking for Community members Interested in competitions
body:
**Hi Community!**

A brand new gaming networks is in the works, and i'm inviting you guys to join up and enjoy the fun!

We will be hosting all sorts of events and competitions! Our first competition starts January 20th 2020 and we will be looking for at least 10-15 teams of 5 to participate.  The entry fee into the tournaments is $25 per person. This will go towards the prizes.

Prizes would be as follows. (To be confirmed based on interest.

1st Place

* Free entry into the next tournament. 
* $100 RP between the team.
* A Custom designed T-Shirt (With ArbitualGaming's Logo) With your team name and Own name included.
* A cool forum and discord tag/trophy!
* Prizes that Riot games donate.

2nd Place

* Discounted entry into the next tournament.
* $50 RP between the team.
* A forum and discord tag/trophy
* Prizes that Riot games donate.

3rd Place

* $25 RP between the team
* Forum and Discord tag/trophy
* Prizes that Riot games donate.

For all Participants you will get a Forum and discord participation tag. 

Registration will open December 16th and Close January 16th


Website: http://www.ArbitualGaming.com - - > Forgive the Forums, we are developing them.

Discord: https://discord.gg/7gxkUpu

Thanks!

Orgastae

P.S I'm hoping this is the right forum for this
